message:
Just the first step, yet another milestone to reach.
Qualification video for RoboCup 2018, Montreal, Canada.

We published our work on "Bayesian Optimisation with Prior Reuse for Motion Planning in Robot Soccer" at CODS-COMAD 2018 conference (http://cods-comad.in/2018/). If you are looking for an approach to reduce the time for solving a complex optimisation problem, check out our paper which can be viewed at https://arxiv.org/abs/1611.01851.

We published our work on "Bayesian Optimisation with Prior Reuse for Motion Planning in Robot Soccer" at CODS-COMAD 2018 conference (http://cods-comad.in/2018/). If you are looking for an approach to reduce the time for solving a complex optimisation problem, check out our paper which can be viewed at https://arxiv.org/abs/1611.01851.

We published our work on "Bayesian Optimisation with Prior Reuse for Motion Planning in Robot Soccer" at CODS-COMAD 2018 conference (http://cods-comad.in/2018/). If you are looking for an approach to reduce the time for solving a complex optimisation problem, check out our paper which can be viewed at https://arxiv.org/abs/1611.01851.

Presenting you "Code-o-soccer Hackathon", a simulation and strategy based coding competition. Here you get the platform to code the match strategy for a team of three robots and show your coding skills!
Only for IIT Kharagpur UG 1st, 2nd and 3rd-year students
Venue - Takshashila, CIC
Timing - 6:30pm onwards, 18th January
P.S - Kindly bring your laptops.

KRSSG wishes everyone Merry Christmas and brings along a Christmas present for Code-O-Soccer 2018.
The last date for submission of code has been extended to 5th January 2018. 
Keep the zeal high and Happy Coding!

Problem solving in complex domains often involves multiple agents, dynamic environments, and the need for learning from previous experience. Robotic soccer is an example of such complex environment.
"Code-O-Soccer", a simulation-based strategic coding event, is back again to provide you with the platform where you code the match strategy for a team of three robots and show your coding skills!
Prizes Worth - ₹50,000/-
Register at: http://ktj.in/sign-up
For more details visit: www.ktj.in or http://event.krssg.in/
Join our Facebook forum to get the insight on the event:- http://tinyurl.com/code-o-soccer
Submit your codes before 5th January 2018

Keeping up with the aim of the RoboCup community to develop and promote advanced robotics and AI research, today we had the opportunity to guide the students from Robotics Society of VSSUT, Odisha, to come up with their own robosoccer bots and participate in RoboCup.
We hope to inspire more such students across India to be a part of the astounding world of robotics.

We hope to inspire more such students across India to be a part of the astounding world of robotics.

Be there to be a part of our team.

Attention Freshers!
KRSSG invites freshers to our Introductory Seminar on 14th October 2017 in Vikramshila V4 at 6 PM.
The seminar will be followed by selections for the Techno-Management Team where freshers will have a golden opportunity to join our team. For Design and Web team, please bring along your previous works(if any)
See you there!

Our bots are now ready to compete in Robocup SSL 2017, to be held in Nagoya, Japan \m/. This year, we qualified for two formats of the game: Small Sized League, and 3D Humanoid Simulation League.
#RoboCup #KRSSGForever

Our bots are now ready to compete in Robocup SSL 2017, to be held in Nagoya, Japan \m/. This year, we qualified for two formats of the game: Small Sized League, and 3D Humanoid Simulation League.
#RoboCup #KRSSGForever
Off to a great start to an awesome RoboCup journey. Do have a look at our SSL 2017 Qualification Video.
